class SXF_NodeRegistry

Interface

Public Members
virtual ~SXF_NodeRegistry()
SXF_Element* getElement(const char* elementType)
SXF_Element* getErrorElement()
SXF_Sequence* getSequence()
Protected Members
SXF_NodeRegistry(SXF_OStream& out)
SXF_Element* bind(const char* name, SXF_Element* element)
virtual int hash(const char* type) const
void allocateRegistry()

Description

The NodeRegistry class implements a repository of available accelerator node readers, element and sequence readers. Selection of element readers is based on the GPERF, a Perfect Hash Function Generator, written by Douglas Schmidt. Registry must supply also an error element reader that is invoked when there is no appropriate reader.

Member Description

virtual ~SXF_NodeRegistry()

Destructor.

SXF_Element* getElement(const char* elementType)

Return an element reader. e.g. getElement("sbend")

SXF_Element* getErrorElement()

Return an error element reader.

SXF_Sequence* getSequence()

Return a sequence reader.

SXF_NodeRegistry(SXF_OStream& out)

Constructor.

SXF_Element* bind(const char* name, SXF_Element* element)

Register a particular element reader.

virtual int hash(const char* type) const

Map element types to their indecies in the collection of element readers.

void allocateRegistry()

Create an array of element readers.
